Command *wiz_tasktool*
***********************

Documentation for the wiz_tasktool command in */cmds/wiz/tasktool.c*.

Command
=======

USAGE ``tasktool``

Invokes the menu-driven tasktool system,
which is intended as a "todo" handler.
